beer.beer_description:
The hops in Innovation are the stars of the show. We used Boadicea, Columbus and Styrian Goldings hops to create punchy grapefruit flavours and aromas of tropical fruits. These are backed up by wheat and pale ale malted barley which add spicy, biscuit flavours and a slight touch of sweetness. The outcome is a wonderfully moreish IPA, packed full of flavour.

What‚Äôs the story?

Upon opening our new brewery, Chairman Jonathan Adnams declared, ‚ÄúWe should have a beer to celebrate!‚Äù

Of course, he didn‚Äôt just see what was lurking at the back of the fridge, oh no. He and the team set about creating one, and this is what they came up with.

Want to know more?

Innovation is the first release of the Jack Brand range of beers. Jack Brand pays homage to the generations of brewers that have come before us and is a happy marriage of the best of the new with the best of the old. It‚Äôs a firm nod to our history, with a lively, exciting slurp of the modern.

items.badge_description: You've just tried one of three available styles from Style Hunt - Ale Trail!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 315 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 64!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 245 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 50! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 450 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 91!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 3!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 60 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description: You've just tried one of three available styles from Style Hunt - Ale Trail!
Does the word picking favorites mean anything to you? Obviously not. That's 10 different beers in a row.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 10 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you‚Äôll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!
